title: [Ta'Illistim, Seneschal Court]
description: The imposing exterior of the Hall of Justice towers above.  Unusually free of extraneous decoration, the simple stone building nevertheless presents both a formidable and impenetrable appearance.  A set of arched double doors is flanked by two city guardsmen.

The imposing exterior of the Hall of Justice towers above.  Largely free of extraneous decoration, the simple stone building nevertheless presents both a formidable and impenetrable appearance.  A set of arched double doors sits behind a tall colonnade of white marble, each column neatly fluted and set with scroll-capped capitals.
